title: spigot.yml的速度检测怎么关闭或是合适的数值
author: qsefthuopq
txt_content: RT settings:   save-user-cache-on-stop-only: false   timeout-time: 60   restart-on-crash: true   restart-script: ./start.sh   netty-threads: 4   attribute:     maxHealth:       max: 8888.0     movementSpeed:       max: 2048.0     attackDamage:       max: 2048.0   bungeecord: false   late-bind: false   sample-count: 12   player-shuffle: 0   filter-creative-items: true   user-cache-size: 1000   int-cache-limit: 1024   moved-wrongly-threshold: 100.000   moved-too-quickly-multiplier: 100.0   item-dirty-ticks: 20   debug: false复制代码

replies.author: Eiup_Niow
replies.txt_content:
moved-too-quickly-multiplier: 100.0

    movementSpeed:
      max: 2048.0

这两个调高即可
